title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck – Dec 3 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck – Dec 3 2021
description:
Daily Review with Clay and Buck – Clay hosts solo while Buck recovers from a cold. Why most late-night comedy isn't funny anymore. There is no legal authority to force employees to get vaccinated. Monica Crowley, fmr. Assistant Treasury Secretary under Trump breaks down the jobs numbers and why she thinks Trump will run. Herschel Walker, fmr. football player and Senate candidate, on the meaning of being an American.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
